Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia UK (DVD title)
Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia USA (new title)

1.title: A Night Patroll
1.plot: With the trolls hiding out in Arcadia, AAARRRGGHH!!. goes undercover to see what Gunmar is up to. A potential rival brings out Jim's jealous side.

2.title: Arcadia's Most Wanted
2.plot: Toby gets caught in the crosshairs when a troll goes missing and the city cracks down on crime. An ancient voice refuses to be silenced.

3.title: Bad Coffee
3.plot: Something strange is brewing at school, where the teachers are more agitated than usual. Claire's illness shows disturbing side effects.

4.title: So I'm Dating a Sorceress
4.plot: A double date night becomes more lively than anyone anticipates when Morgana takes possession of Claire at dinner.

5.title: The Exorcism of Claire Nunez
5.plot: To free Claire from possession by Morgana, Stricklander is summoned to help, but Morgana has formidable ways to resist.

6.title: Parental Guidance
6.plot: When Jim's mother's memories of the Troll world reemerge, she gathers Tobia and Claire's parents together to confront their children about their activities as the kids struggle to invent a cover story.

7.title: The Oath
7.plot: With the future of two worlds at stake, the team races to find Merlin's Tomb and the Staff of Avalon before Gunmar can get his hands on it.

8.title: For the Glory of Merlin
8.plot: A long-dormant ally shows Jim and his friends what really happened at the Battle of Killahead. Gunmar awakens Morgana, and Angor Rot plots his revenge.

9.title: In Goods Hands
9.plot: Even while the Trollhunters gather components for Merlin for a spell, Jim's only chance to avoid being held back at school is to show around a pair of new and very strange exchange students.

10.title: A House Divided
10.plot: As Gunmar hunts for the key to free Morgana, Merlin ruthlessly manipulates Jim into making a dramatic and irrevocable choice for what he considers the greater good.

11.title: Jimhunters
11.plot: A greatly changed Jim renews his Trollhunter training but struggles to accept his new reality. Gunmar and Morgana rally the troops for an attack.

12.title: The Eternal Knight Pt.1
12.plot: The Eternal Night covers Arcadia in shadow, leading to a long-awaited showdown between Gunmar and the newly transformed Trollhunter.

13.title: The Eternal Knight Pt.2
13.plot: An epic battle comes ahead in the darkness as Jim and his friends push back against Morgana. But without Merlin, how will they stop her?

1.title: Becoming: Part 1
1.plot: After losing its old champion, a magical amulet seeks a new one.

2.title: Becoming: Part 2
2.plot: Still reeling from the discovery of the amulet's power, a stunned Jim meets his new mentors and learns he's been tasked with a sacred responsibility.

3.title: Wherefore Art Thou, Trollhunter?
3.plot: Jim and Toby tour Heartstone Trollmarket, where Jim begins his training and the presence of the first human Trollhunter stirs up bitter resentment.

4.title: Gnome Your Enemy
4.plot: While Jim gets a crash course in troll history, big problems - and a bully - await him in the human world. What better time for his first mission?

5.title: Waka Chaka!
5.plot: Jim tries to get closer to Claire on a school field trip to the museum, only to learn that the museum's curator, Ms. Nomura, has an unsettling secret.

6.title: Win Lose or Draal
6.plot: Jim preps for a high-stakes rematch against Draal, the amulet's seemingly rightful heir. But their animosity gives way to a surprising partnership.

7.title: To Catch a Changeling
7.plot: After Jim finds the Killahead Bridge has been moved, he must use a horseshoe to find who in Arcadia is a changeling.

8.title: Adventures in Trollsitting
8.plot: While Draal settles into his new digs, Jim volunteers to babysit so he can find out whether Claire's little brother, Enrique, is a Changeling.

9.title: Bittersweet Sixteen
9.plot: Jim's 16th birthday is full of surprises, including the arrival of a terrifying new species of troll that's immune to the effects of sunlight.

10.title: Young Atlas
10.plot: Draal gives Jim a troll-made totem to help curb his anxiety about Claire. But Jim's newfound overconfidence leads him to a startling realization.

11.title: Recipe for Disaster
11.plot: The gang breaks into Strickler's office for clues to Killahead Bridge but ends up releasing a monster into school, and Strickler reveals his true form.

12.title: Claire and Present Danger
12.plot: The Killahead Bridge is complete, but the door to the Darklands still won't open. Jim is forced to tell Claire the truth when she becomes a target.

13.title: The Battle of Two Bridges
13.plot: Jim must surrender to Bular and unlock the Killahead Bridge to save kidnapped Blinky and promises Claire that he will get her brother back.

14.title: Return of the Trollhunter
14.plot: Claire gets her first look at Heartstone Trollmarket, and Jim receives a ghostly summons. Elsewhere, Strickler awakens an ancient assassin.

15.title: Mudslinging
15.plot: Jim searches for a way to kill Gunmar so Claire can bring her brother back home. A power-hungry Strickler returns to Arcadia with Angor Rot.

16.title: Roaming Fees May Apply
16.plot: The heroes launch a dangerous quest to find the first Triumbric Stone. Angor Rot concocts a charm that links Strickler and Barbara's fates.

17.title: Blinky's Day Out
17.plot: A barely recognizable Blinky experiences the highs and lows of being human. Angor Rot marks Jim for a fate that's worse than death.

18.title: The Shattered King
18.plot: The heroes' search for the second Triumbric Stone takes them deep into unfamiliar marshlands. Claire asks Jim to be her dance partner.

19.title: Airheads
19.plot: Toby and Claire take on a Trollhunter task so Jim can win a Spring King challenge. In the process, they learn to master new weapons.

20.title: Where Is My Mind?
20.plot: A horde of pixies descends on Arcadia Oaks High, sending the student body into a tailspin. Angor Rot comes to Jim with a surprising proposal.

21.title: Party Monster
21.plot: The Changeling posing as Claire's little brother throws a house party for the trolls of Arcadia. Jim and Toby look for a way to take Strickler's ring.

22.title: It's About Time
22.plot: Every second counts when Jim turns to a time-stopping Kairosect to snatch Strickler's ring, save his mother and find the second Triumbric Stone.

23.title: Wingmen
23.plot: A troll queen arrives from afar to take AAARRRGGHH!!! back to his homeland, revealing his devastating secret. Strickler asks Jim for protection.

24.title: Angor Management
24.plot: A reluctant Jim joins forces with Strickler to keep Barbara alive. Gnome Chompsky returns from the Darklands with important news about Enrique.

25.title: A Night to Remember
25.plot: With Barbara's life hanging in the balance, Jim races to break the spell that bonds her to Strickler. Angor Rot attacks Toby and Claire.

26.title: Something Rotten This Way Comes
26.plot: The heroes brace for Angor Rot's inevitable invasion and prepare for the fight of their lives. Jim locates the last Triumbric Stone.

1.title: Escape from the Darklands
1.plot: In the Darklands, Jim becomes captured by Gunmar, but manages to save Clare's baby brother. Killahead bridge has been destroyed and the Trollhunters will stop at nothing to save Jim.

2.title: Skullcrusher
2.plot: While Jim is trapped in the Dark World with Gunmar. The rest of the team builds a plan to rescue him, all while trying not to let the human world know Jim is missing.

3.title: Grand Theft Otto
3.plot: When a new plan of action fails, the team finds a secret ability in Toby that helps the team in their search to help Jim.

4.title: KanjigAAARRRGGHH!!!
4.plot: On the hunt to free Jim the team finds that it may require the help of an old friend returned. Jim makes an alliance while in Gunmar's Prisons.

5.title: Homecoming
5.plot: Hope springs from an unlikely source when Gunmar learns that Jim's friends are in the Darklands on a mission to bring him home.

6.title: Hiss Hiss, Bang Bang
6.plot: Now out of the Darklands and readjusting to life in Arcadia, Jim and the team must face the consequences of their risky actions.

7.title: Hero with a Thousand Faces
7.plot: Multiple problems plague a frazzled Jim when his amulet goes on the fritz and Claire invites him to meet her parents at a family barbecue.

8.title: Just Add Water
8.plot: When a oozy creature shows up in Arcadia, Jim and the gang set out to find it - while playing parents to two sacks of flour for a school assignment.

9.title: Creepslayerz
9.plot: In a revealing flashback episode, Otto and Dictatious vie for Gunmar's ear while an increasingly paranoid Steve finds an unlikely ally.

10.title: The Reckless Club
10.plot: Señor Uhl sentences Jim and his friends to detention while Queen Usurna gathers evidence of a conspiracy. Draal comes face to face with Gunmar.

11.title: Unbecoming
11.plot: Facing serious accusations from the Tribunal, Jim gets the chance to see what his life would be like if he'd never found the amulet.

12.title: Mistrial and Error
12.plot: Jim stands trial for unleashing Gunmar while his friends race to clear his name. If convicted, he'll be sent to "The Deep," a dark realm of no return.

13.title: In the Hall of the Gumm-Gumm King
13.plot: A monumental loss carries a warning from beyond the grave as Gunmar marches for the Heartstone Trollmarket. Can the team pull together to save the day?

imdb.plot outline: Jim Lake Jr. is an ordinary kid with a busy Mom and a yearning to have more adventure in his life. As it happens, Jim gets more than he wished when he finds a magic amulet under a bridge.calling to him. With that discovery, Jim finds himself recruited as the next. and first human, Troll Hunter, the champion of the Troll world. Together with his friend, Toby Domzalski, Jim discovers the world of Troll Market, where he begins his training under the tutelage of his new mentors, Blinky and AAARRRGGHH!!!, who also tell him of the threat of the Gumm Gumms, who scheme to release their leader, Gunmar the Black, to conquer both the Troll and Human worlds. In the struggle ahead, Jim and his friends will discover enemies and friends where they least expect them as their shadow war draws ever greater danger and complications into all their lives.
imdb.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
plot: An ordinary boy finds a magic amulet that chooses him to be a Trollhunter, a guardian that defends the world of humans and the secret world of trolls.::Kenneth Chisholm

Jim Lake Jr. is an ordinary kid with a busy Mom and a yearning to have more adventure in his life. As it happens, Jim gets more than he wished when he finds a magic amulet under a bridge.calling to him. With that discovery, Jim finds himself recruited as the next. and first human, Troll Hunter, the champion of the Troll world. Together with his friend, Toby Domzalski, Jim discovers the world of Troll Market, where he begins his training under the tutelage of his new mentors, Blinky and AAARRRGGHH!!!, who also tell him of the threat of the Gumm Gumms, who scheme to release their leader, Gunmar the Black, to conquer both the Troll and Human worlds. In the struggle ahead, Jim and his friends will discover enemies and friends where they least expect them as their shadow war draws ever greater danger and complications into all their lives.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@rogers.com)
